Darkfate/Chameleon::

"Drillbit is here" said the Dragon "I commanded to one of my troop 
that show him the place... "Darkfate used his comm link "Chameleon... 
Where is the commander Drillbit?"

"It's here... He's er... Meeting our mess hall, sir, I... " answered 
chameleon.

"Enough... We're going to mess hall, where I'll give you some 
orders.."

"Follow me, please..." said darkfte to Starscreams and the others

--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, Alloran2@a... wrote:
> :::Starscream/Bludgeon/Obsidian/Sharpedge/Godfather:::
> 
> ::Starscream, Bludgeon and Obsidian hear Darkfate::
> Starscream: yes, we are some of Drillbit's troops.  Is Drillbit 
around? If 
> not, can you tell us the current situation?
> ~~~~~
> ::Sharpedge gets Deemos' transmission::
> Sharpedge: Sure thing, Deemos. Hey Godfather!
> Godfather: What is it?
> Sharpedge: Deemos put me in command of his position.  We're headed 
for the 
> battle at the CF!
> Godfather: Hmm, maybe i can whack a couple of Maxis...
> ::Godfather activates his jet pack::
> Sharpedge: Oh, no, im NOT riding on your back!
> ::5 minutes later::
> Sharpedge: I cant beleive, im riding on his back. This is SO 
degrading!
> Godfather: Shut the f*ck up, it aint no picnic for me either.
> ::They head for the CF::
